ai-tha-ap268:1.1_0: “One from the bank of the river,
ai-tha-ap268:1.2_0: I was also very hard to see.
ai-tha-ap268:2.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap268:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap268:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Koḷivisa.
ai-tha-ap268:5.1_0: for the sixth year of the Elder Nun Pañcakaṅga
